titleStmt.title: The London practice of physick, or, The whole practical part of Physick contained in the works of Dr. Willis faithfully made English, and printed together for the publick good.
titleStmt.author: Willis, Thomas, 1621-1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Basset ... and William Crooke ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Thomas Willis. cf. NUC pre-1956.

Synopsis of 5 treatises contained in the author's Practice of Physick: Pharmaceutice rationalis, Of convulsive diseases, Of the scurvy, Of the diseases of the brain and the genus nervosum, and Of fevers. cf. Preface.
